name: ste-browser
description: Add the power of events directly to your client projects. This version of Strongly Typed Events works in the browser.

scripts.build: del-cli ./lib & browserify ./src/ste-core.js -o ./dist/ste-core.js & uglifyjs ./dist/ste-core.js --source-map -o ./dist/ste-core.min.js & browserify ./src/ste-events.js -o ./dist/ste-events.js & uglifyjs ./dist/ste-events.js --source-map -o ./dist/ste-events.min.js & browserify ./src/ste-simple-events.js -o ./dist/ste-simple-events.js & uglifyjs ./dist/ste-simple-events.js --source-map -o ./dist/ste-simple-events.min.js & browserify ./src/ste-signals.js -o ./dist/ste-signals.js & uglifyjs ./dist/ste-signals.js --source-map -o ./dist/ste-signals.min.js & browserify ./src/strongly-typed-events.js -o ./dist/strongly-typed-events.js & uglifyjs ./dist/strongly-typed-events.js --source-map -o ./dist/strongly-typed-events.min.js

author: Kees C. Bakker (https://keestalkstech.com)
